summary: A film about the battle between love and fear, between two stubborn men and their opposing beliefs and the outcome of the love stories of 3 couples.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Shah Rukh Khan|Uday Chopra|Jugal Hansraj|Jimmy Sheirgill|Shamita Shetty|Preeti Jhangiani|Kim Sharma|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Anupam Kher|Archana Puran Singh|Saurabh Shukla|Helen|Amrish Puri|Shefali Shah|Raman Lamba|Parzaan Dastur|Ram Mohan|Geri Andrade|Rushad Rana|Mehul Nisar|Palash Dutta|Pearl Sukhadia|Meghna Patel|Sindhu Tolani|Sitaram|Gurdial Sira|Harpal Singh Pali|Abraham Chowdhury|Raza Miah|Hiten Patel|Kishore Bhatt|Sunny Dhinsey|Priya Gill|Jaswir Kaur|Manjeet Kular|Navneet Nishan|Saima Noor|Himani Rawat|Samir Shah
title: Mohabbatein
